item.name: knife
item.description: You see a blunt knife which looks capable of little damage.

item.name: dagger
item.description: You see a dagger, it is little more than decorative but you may be able to hurt something with it.

item.name: short_sword
item.description: You see a well kept short sword which will be easy to carry as you travel.

item.name: sword
item.description: You see a sharp sword which might even be worth a little.

item.name: scimitar
item.description: This scimitar catches the light as you look at it, it will be a powerful weapon.

item.name: katana
item.description: You see a valuable katana, with a lethal looking blade.

item.name: claymore
item.description: This claymore is very hard to lift as it is so heavy. It will be a good weapon if you can swing it.

item.name: broadsword
item.description: You see a mighty broadsword. Enemies will see their death.

item.name: biting_sword
item.description: The point of this biting sword is chiselled to a lethal point. It will serve you well.

item.name: great_sword
item.description: This rare great sword is heavy and of good craftmanship.

item.name: fire_sword
item.description: Flames race along this fire sword as you wield it.

item.name: ice_sword
item.description: You see an ice sword, the blade is lethally cold to the touch, and you know it is one of the best weapons you'll find.

item.name: vampire_sword
item.description: You see the vampire sword, which will suck life from those you attack with it.

item.name: r_hand_sword
item.description: You see r hand sword. It must be used with l hand sword.

item.name: l_hand_sword
item.description: You see l hand sword. It must be used with r hand sword.

item.name: old_scythe
item.description: You see an old scythe, it used to be weapon of death. But now it is only a useful tool for farming.

item.name: small_axe
item.description: You see a small axe. It appears well made but you suspect it is too light to do much damage.

item.name: hand_axe
item.description: You see a hand axe, well worn from years of use but may prove useful.

item.name: axe
item.description: You see a rusty but heavy axe. What it lacks in sharpness it makes up for in weight.

item.name: battle_axe
item.description: You see a battle axe. It is well crafted and sharp despite its age.

item.name: bardiche
item.description: You see a rare and powerful bardiche.

item.name: scythe
item.description: You see the weapon of death - a scythe. It looks dangerous but perhaps also a useful tool for farming.

item.name: twoside_axe
item.description: You see a well crafted twoside axe.

item.name: halberd
item.description: You see a rare halberd, with an axe's blade fused onto a shaft. It is both heavy and keen-edged.

item.name: club
item.description: You see a wooden club. It won't kill much but is better than no weapon.

item.name: mace
item.description: You see a mace, much neglected in years of use.

item.name: flail
item.description: You see a military flail. Swinging it in circles will tire you but it will be an effective weapon.

item.name: mace_+2
item.description: You see a shining mace +2. Despite looking ornamental, it is sharp enough to do some damage.

item.name: skull_staff
item.description: You see a rare skull staff. It appears mystical but will work like any other staff.

item.name: hammer
item.description: You see a common hammer. It is heavy enough that you should be able to bludgeon your enemies with it.

item.name: hammer_+3
item.description: You see a valuable hammer +3. This golden weapon may be worth a lot to someone.

item.name: war_hammer
item.description: You see a huge war hammer. It is a fearsome weapon.

item.name: wooden_bow
item.description: You see a wooden bow. With this in one hand, and wooden arrows in the other, you may be able to attack from a distance.

item.name: wooden_arrow
item.description: You see a wooden arrow. With a supply of arrows in one hand and a bow in the other you can fight from a distance.

item.name: buckler
item.description: You see a small buckler. It may protect you against swords and maces but against stronger weapons you do not trust it.

item.name: wooden_shield
item.description: You see a wooden shield. It is made of cheap wood and heavily used. However, it still seems to offer you some kind of basic protection.

item.name: studded_shield
item.description: You see a studded shield. It's a little dented but seems robust enough.

item.name: plate_shield
item.description: You see a solid plate shield. It is in good condition, and might be worth a little.

item.name: lion_shield
item.description: You see a valuable lion shield. It is heavy enough to defend you against strong attacks.

item.name: unicorn_shield
item.description: You see a unicorn shield. It's beautifully crafted and will give you excellent protection.

item.name: lion_shield_+1
item.description: A lion shield +1 glints at you. It will defend you well.

item.name: skull_shield
item.description: The face of a skull scowls at you from this fearsome skull shield.

item.name: crown_shield
item.description: You see a mighty crown shield. It is in perfect condition.

item.name: golden_shield
item.description: You see a golden shield, the ultimate in defence.

item.name: dress
item.description: You see a dress, which provides practically no defence. It is barely worth picking up.

item.name: leather_armor
item.description: You see a worn suit of leather armor. It will provide only minimal protection.

item.name: leather_cuirass
item.description: You see a leather cuirass, well made but still able to be pierced by sharp swords.

item.name: leather_armor_+1
item.description: You see a suit of leather armor +1. The leather is toughened somehow for better protection.

item.name: studded_armor
item.description: You see a suit of studded armor. Some studs are loose or rusty but it is still fit for purpose.

item.name: chain_armor
item.description: You see a suit of chain armor. Perhaps even if you don't need it, you can sell it.

item.name: chain_armor_+1
item.description: You see a robust suit of chain armor +1. The links are closely spaces so even the sharpest point shoudl not pierce it.

item.name: scale_armor
item.description: You see a suit of scale armor. It is not flexible like chain, but will be a better defense.

item.name: scale_armor_+1
item.description: You see a suit of scale armor +1, whose rounded scales will protect you from many blows.

item.name: chain_armor_+3
item.description: You see a valuable suit of chain armor +3. It is crafted from fine links of expensive metal.

item.name: scale_armor_+2
item.description: You see a formidable suit of scale armor +2.

item.name: plate_armor
item.description: You see a suit of plate armor. You imagine it would be heavy but the steel is well tempered and the suit is very strong.

item.name: golden_armor
item.description: You see a suit of golden armor. It's made from the best materials with great attention to detail.

item.name: leather_helmet
item.description: You see a leather helmet, it seems more like a hat than a defensive item.

item.name: studded_helmet
item.description: You see a studded helmet, it should protect your head against cuts but perhaps not hard blows.

item.name: chain_helmet
item.description: You see a solid chain helmet, it will be excellent protection for your head.

item.name: golden_helmet
item.description: You see a heavy golden helmet. The thick metal should protect you against almost anything.

item.name: leather_legs
item.description: You see a pair of leather legs. They look new but they're poor quality.

item.name: studded_legs
item.description: You see a pair of blood stained studded legs. You're not sure if the blood came from their last owner ... or his enemies.

item.name: chain_legs
item.description: You see a pair of well made chain legs. They should protect you against any attacks aimed low.

item.name: golden_legs
item.description: You see a pair of shining, strong golden legs.

item.name: leather_boots
item.description: You see a simple pair of leather boots to give your feet some protection.

item.name: studded_boots
item.description: You see a pair of worn studded boots with moderate protection for your feet.

item.name: chain_boots
item.description: You see a pair of chain boots, quite rusty but still strong.

item.name: steel_boots
item.description: You see a pair of steel boots, fit for any soldier.

item.name: golden_boots
item.description: You see a pair of golden boots. They will be heavy to wear but well worth their weight.

item.name: cloak
item.description: You see a simple cloth cloak.

item.name: elf_cloak
item.description: You see a white elf cloak. It doesn't look very warm.

item.name: dwarf_cloak
item.description: You see a dwarf cloak. Apparently this passes for fashion in some parts, but to you it looks more functional than fashionable.

item.name: elf_cloak_+2
item.description: You see a blue elf cloak +2. The material is thick and warm.

item.name: green_dragon_cloak
item.description: You see a huge green dragon cloak. It's probably too big for you but, even dragging on the floor it will provide excellent protection.

item.name: bone_dragon_cloak
item.description: You see a bone dragon cloak. It's incredibly old, like its last owner.

item.name: lich_cloak
item.description: You see a purple lich cloak. It's stained with blood - yours, from the previous undead owner, or perhaps the blood of his enemies...

item.name: vampire_cloak
item.description: You see a vibrant red vampire cloak. Wearing it sends a shiver down your spine.

item.name: blue_dragon_cloak
item.description: You see a blue dragon cloak. The weave is tight and strong, though you wish the colour drew less attention.

item.name: black_dragon_cloak
item.description: You see a torn section from an enormous black dragon cloak. You're very lucky: the piece is just the right size for a human to wear.

item.name: ham
item.description: You see a juicy ham.

item.name: sandwich
item.description: You see a ham and cheese sandwich.

item.name: pie
item.description: You see a meat and vegetable pie.

item.name: antidote
item.description: You see an antidote, to cure you of poison and protect you for a while.

item.name: wood
item.description: You see some wood, fallen from a nearby tree.

item.name: grain
item.description: You see a sheaf of grain.

item.name: present
item.description: You see a christmas present. Open it.

item.name: dungeon_silver_key
item.description: A fancy silver key

item.name: lich_gold_key
item.description: A fancy golden key
